name: Carrot Cave
description:
HOLD SPACE TO BOUNCE (For every bounce you jump higher, do not bump into the roof)

Made in 2 days for 6th Alakajam!

Your goal is to leave the cave before the turtle, else you'll be trapped forever! Beware, each level you beat makes the turtle faster and faster, grab carrots to slow down the turtle.

CONTROLS:

  • A,Left Arrow - Move left
  • D,Right Arrow - Move right
  • Space - Jump / HOLD TO BOUNCE
  • Enter - Pause/Start button

The turtle is at advantage, his path is straight with no hazards in the way, but naturally, he's still a turtle so he's very slow; be swift and nimble

CREDITS:

  • Programming/Music/SFX: Antkibo
  • Art/Level design: veryeviltomato
